# Wychwood Partners — LLM Detail

## Positioning
Operator-led Operating Partner and Fractional COO work focused on performance control, capital discipline, and scalable execution systems.

## Core services
1) Operating System Architecture
- Decision rights and escalation paths
- Metrics hierarchy from team to board
- Unit economics governance and variance thresholds
- Weekly execution rhythm that holds

2) Forecasting & Capital Planning
- Driver-based forecasting and scenario planning
- Cash visibility and working capital control
- Trigger thresholds that force decisions
- Capital allocation discipline

3) Leadership Execution Cadence
- Meeting architecture and decision hygiene
- Accountability loops and operating rhythms
- Clear outputs, owners, and follow-through

## Engagement models
- Post-investment / post-acquisition stabilisation (30–180 days)
- Scale systems for growth and multi-site replication
- Integration management for buy-side acquisitions
- Founder partnership through scale inflection points
